title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Real-Time Video Conferencing Classes in BYOD Environments for Learners Preparing for Careers in Medical, Legal, or Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain types of cognitive load (extraneous/intrinsic/germane) when designing video-based learning materials.
Learners can optimize information presentation in online learning environments to reduce extraneous cognitive load by over 30%.
Learners can develop personalized learning strategies considering their domain expertise and computer usage attitudes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
